messages: Against impossible odds, you struck down a monstrous foe. Songs will be sung of this battle.
Your blade felled a nightmare given flesh.
You stood alone against terror — and prevailed.
A legendary victory echoes through the wilds.
You defeated a fearsome creature and emerged victorious.
The monster fell after a brutal clash.
You hunted well, earning both experience and scars.
Your skill carried you through the battle.
You were overwhelmed and forced to flee, shaken by the encounter.
The monster nearly ended you. Retreat was the only option.
Fear took hold and you barely escaped alive.
This foe was far beyond you.
The monsters were too strong today. You escaped with your life.
You fought bravely but gained little from the encounter.
The battle taught you humility — and survival.
You withdrew before things turned fatal.
